QuestData.Title: Forest Refugees
QuestData.Description:
Some of those displaced by the fallen groves have made a home for themselves at the base of the Heart of the Forest.
Hibernal Hollow is fortunate. We have supplies, when they may not.
If you would, bring these to Flwngyrr. They care for the refugees there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Hibernal Hollow supplies to Flwngyrr in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText:
Many cries call in the night. Many creatures seek shelter.
This is a refreshing breeze.
